features.additionalInfo: Card numbers are generated dynamically for each payment that is made, with an unlimited number able to be created. No physical card is issued on this account.
The full balance will be automatically swept from the nominated bank account on the settlement date.
Regardless of your business structure and needs, we have an online banking solution that will suit you.
Complimentary transit accident insurance up to $250,000 for cardholders.
Complimentary Unauthorised Use insurance up to $150,000 a year.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Each application for credit is assessed on the ability of the business to service debt (limit) based on the financials supplied in the application. Suitability of the product is assessed through a workshop process between the client and the bank.

fees.name: Cash equivalent items or cash substitutes cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: While no physical card is available to withdraw cash, the bank also charges a cash advance fee ($1.25) and interest (17.99%) for customers using their Virtual Cards for a cash equivalent item or cash substitutes. Cash equivalent items or cash substitutes include the purchase of travellers cheques and foreign currency, e.g. Travelex, as well as online gambling, e.g. Sportsbet, Pokerstars, Online Lottery and TAB.

fees.name: Cash equivalent items or cash substitutes cash advance charge
fees.additionalInfo: While no physical card is available to withdraw cash, the bank also charges a cash advance fee ($1.25) and interest (17.99%) for customers using their Virtual Cards for a cash equivalent item or cash substitutes. Cash equivalent items or cash substitutes include the purchase of travellers cheques and foreign currency, e.g. Travelex, as well as online gambling, e.g. Sportsbet, Pokerstars, Online Lottery and TAB.

fees.name: International Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies anytime cash advances, purchases or permitted transactions are converted by Mastercard from foreign currencies to Australian dollar equivalents. For cash advances, the relevant cash advance charge will also apply. Also applies to purchases while the accountholder is overseas, or while they are in Australia (for example online) where the merchant, or the financial institution or entity processing the transaction, is located overseas. Please note additional fees may be charged by the overseas merchant.

data.name: Virtual Cards
data.description: Virtual Cards are a streamlined travel and procurement management solution, which provides large businesses the ability to take advantage of extended payment terms, transaction level payment security, and transaction level data through the deployment of single-use virtual cards.
